document_data.name: Callem Bormul
document_data.mainbody:
Baron '''Callem Bormul''' was a Lord and a senior member of the noble [[patriar]] [[Bormul]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] and a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|A mighty leader, a mighty city.|Lord Callem Bormul}}
document_data.Description: Callem was a handsome [[human]] man with a light skin tone, dark eyes, long black hair, and a trimmed black short beared. Callem wore an expensive ensemble, gray in color, decorated with golden trim and a golden necklace.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, shortly before the armies of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] attacked the city of Baldur's Gate, Baron Callem Bormul was a Parliamentarian of the Gate and voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord [[Enver Gortash]] as the city's Archduke. Callem was present for Gortash's coronation that took place in the audience hall of [[Wyrm's Rock]]. Following the coronation, he proudly proclaimed his support for Gortash' accession, stating that [[Balduran]] himself would be proud of the new Archduke.
